author: Gina Yu, CNN
title: Trump suggests hydroxychloroquine may protect against Covid-19. Researchers say there's no evidence of that
description: President Donald Trump has twice tested negative for the coronavirus, but during a briefing at the White House on Saturday, he said he "may take" the drug hydroxychloroquine against Covid-19. He suggested it has protective effects against the novel coronaviru…
